newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan Semiconductor August sales surge.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan Semiconductor August sales surge.

text.p: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co, Taiwan's largest semiconductor maker, said on Monday its August sales jumped 33.5 percent to T$3.244 billion from T$2.430 billion a year earlier.
Its sales in the first eight months surged 62.3 percent to T$28.035 billion from T$17.278 billion a year earlier, it said in a statement.
It did not give profit figures.
Taiwan Semiconductor has set a 1996 net profit target of T$22.07 billion on sales of T$41.97 billion.
